category_description: Practice real-life conversations across various Nigerian contexts

modules.title: Food & Dining
modules.description: Practice conversations in restaurants, markets, and food-related situations

scenarios.title: Buying Vegetables at Market
scenarios.description: Practice buying onions and tomatoes at local market
learning_objectives: Learn vegetable names in local language

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome to my market! What would you like to buy today?

user_options.text: I want to buy onions and tomatoes, please
Give me vegetables
user_options.response: Please be specific. What vegetables do you want?
user_options.cultural_note: Too vague, specify what you need

user_options.text: Do you have meat?
user_options.response: Sorry, I only sell vegetables here. What vegetables would you like?
user_options.cultural_note: Asking for wrong type of product

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good choice! Fresh onions are 200 Naira per kg and tomatoes are 300 Naira. How much do you want?

user_options.text: 2 kg of onions and 1 kg of tomatoes, please
Just a little
user_options.response: Please be specific. How many kilograms do you want?

user_options.text: Whatever you have
user_options.response: You need to tell me how much you want to buy

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: That will be 700 Naira total. Would you like peppers or other vegetables?

user_options.text: No, that's all. Thank you!
Yes, add some peppers too
user_options.response: Good choice! Let me add that for you.

user_options.text: That's too expensive
user_options.response: These are fresh market prices. Would you like to proceed?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Perfect! Your total is 700 Naira. Thank you for shopping with us!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Great job! You successfully completed the vegetable shopping scenario.

scenarios.title: Ordering Jollof Rice
scenarios.description: Practice ordering food at a local restaurant

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good afternoon! Welcome to our restaurant. Are you ready to order?

user_options.text: Yes, I'd like jollof rice with chicken and plantain
user_options.response: Excellent choice! Would you like any soup with that?

user_options.text: What do you have?
user_options.response: We have jollof rice, fried rice, egusi soup, and pepper soup. What would you like?
user_options.cultural_note: Should check menu first before ordering

user_options.text: Just bring me food
user_options.response: I need to know what specific dish you would like

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Would you like egusi soup or pepper soup with your meal?

user_options.text: Yes, I'll have egusi soup with pounded yam
user_options.response: Perfect choice! Anything to drink?

user_options.text: No soup, just the rice
user_options.response: Okay, just jollof rice with chicken and plantain. Anything to drink?

user_options.text: Whatever you recommend
user_options.response: I need you to make a choice. Would you like soup or not?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: What would you like to drink? We have water, soft drinks, and fresh juice

user_options.text: A bottle of water and Chapman, please
user_options.response: Excellent! Your total is 3,500 Naira. Food will be ready in 20 minutes

user_options.text: Just bring me anything
user_options.response: Please specify what drink you would prefer

user_options.text: I don't want anything to drink
user_options.response: Okay, your total is 2,800 Naira. Food will be ready in 20 minutes

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for your order! Your food will be served shortly. Enjoy your meal!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You successfully ordered a complete Nigerian meal at the restaurant.

scenarios.title: Buying Street Food
scenarios.description: Practice ordering from street food vendors

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Hot akara! Fresh akara! 50 Naira each! What will you take?

user_options.text: I'll take 4 pieces of akara, please
user_options.response: Good choice! That will be 200 Naira. Want pap with it?

user_options.text: How much is everything?
user_options.response: Akara is 50 Naira each. How many do you want?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Would you like pap to go with your akara? It's 100 Naira extra

user_options.text: Yes, please add pap with milk and sugar
user_options.response: Perfect! Total is 300 Naira. Here you go!

user_options.text: No, just the akara
user_options.response: Okay, 200 Naira for 4 akara. Here you go!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Enjoy your meal! Come back again for fresh akara tomorrow!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Well done! You successfully ordered street food like a local.

scenarios.title: Supermarket Shopping
scenarios.description: Practice finding items and checking out at supermarket

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome to ShopRite! Can I help you find anything today?

user_options.text: Yes, where can I find rice and beans?
user_options.response: Grains are in aisle 3. Follow me, I'll show you

user_options.text: I'm looking for food
user_options.response: What type of food are you looking for? We have different sections

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Here are the rice and beans. We have local and imported varieties. What would you prefer?

user_options.text: I'll take 5kg of local rice and 2kg of brown beans
user_options.response: Good choice! Anything else you need?

user_options.text: Just give me any rice
user_options.response: We have different types and prices. Which one would you prefer?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Will that be all for you today?

user_options.text: Yes, that's all. Where is the checkout?
user_options.response: Checkout is straight ahead. Have a nice day!

user_options.text: I also need cooking oil and spices
user_options.response: Oils are in aisle 2 and spices in aisle 4. I can show you

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for shopping with us! Your total is 8,500 Naira at checkout
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You successfully navigated supermarket shopping.

scenarios.title: Dinner Party Conversation
scenarios.description: Practice making small talk at a dinner party

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good evening! I'm Chinedu, the host. Welcome to our dinner party!

user_options.text: Good evening! Thank you for inviting me. The place looks beautiful
user_options.response: Thank you! Let me introduce you to some guests

user_options.text: Hi, where's the food?
user_options.response: Food will be served shortly. Let me introduce you to other guests first

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: This is Ada, she's also in the tech industry like you

user_options.text: Nice to meet you, Ada! What company do you work with?
user_options.response: I work with Flutterwave. How about you?

user_options.text: Hello
user_options.response: Hello... so what do you do for work?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: I've been there 2 years now. Do you enjoy working in tech?

user_options.text: Yes, I love the innovation. Currently working on mobile banking apps
user_options.response: That sounds interesting! Tell me more about your projects

user_options.text: It's okay
user_options.response: Oh... well, dinner is being served soon

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Dinner is served everyone! Please come to the dining table
conversation_flow.completion_message: Wonderful! You made great conversation at the dinner party.

modules.title: Greetings & Introductions
modules.description: Learn proper greetings and introductions in various social contexts

scenarios.title: Formal Greeting
scenarios.description: Practice formal greetings in professional settings

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning sir. Welcome to our office. I'm Mr. Johnson, the manager

user_options.text: Good morning Mr. Johnson. I'm pleased to meet you. I'm Tunde Adebayo
user_options.response: Nice to meet you too, Mr. Adebayo. How can I help you today?

user_options.text: Hey, what's up?
user_options.response: Good morning... I'm Mr. Johnson. How can I assist you?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: What brings you to our office today, Mr. Adebayo?

user_options.text: I have an appointment to discuss the marketing manager position
user_options.response: Yes, I have your application here. Please have a seat

user_options.text: I'm just looking around
user_options.response: This is a professional office. Do you have specific business here?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: I see you have extensive experience in digital marketing. Tell me about your previous role

user_options.text: I worked as Digital Marketing Lead at Konga for 3 years, managing a team of 5
user_options.response: Impressive experience. Let me get the HR manager to join us

user_options.text: I did marketing stuff
user_options.response: Could you be more specific about your roles and responsibilities?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for coming in today. We'll contact you about next steps
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You handled the formal professional greeting perfectly.

scenarios.title: Informal Greeting with Friends
scenarios.description: Practice casual greetings with friends and peers

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Hey bro! Long time no see! How you dey?

user_options.text: I dey fine my guy! How you sef?
user_options.response: I dey kampe! Wetin you don dey do these days?

user_options.text: Good morning sir. I am doing well, thank you
user_options.response: Bro, why you dey talk like say na office? How body?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: I hear say you don change work. How the new place dey?

user_options.text: The work sweet die! Better salary and flexible hours
user_options.response: That's good to hear! Make you no forget us when you don rich

user_options.text: The new employment situation is quite satisfactory
user_options.response: Guy, why you dey use big big English? How work dey?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Make we hang out this weekend. My place dey available

user_options.text: Sure thing! I go come with some drinks and plantain chips
user_options.response: Perfect! I go fry some chicken. See you then!

user_options.text: I shall consider your invitation and revert accordingly
user_options.response: Bro, you don turn lawyer? Just tell me if you go come!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Alright my guy! Make we yarn better when you come. Safe!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You nailed the casual Nigerian conversation with friends.

scenarios.title: Greeting Elders
scenarios.description: Learn respectful greetings for older people

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning, my child. You are welcome

user_options.text: Good morning, ma. How are you doing today?
user_options.response: I am fine, my dear. Thank you for asking. Who are you looking for?

user_options.text: Hey, what's up?
user_options.response: Young man, is that how you greet your elders?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: I am Mama Bisi. Are you visiting someone in this compound?

user_options.text: Yes ma, I'm here to see Mr. Adekunle. I'm his nephew from Lagos
user_options.response: Ah, Adekunle's nephew! He's inside. Please come in

user_options.text: I'm just passing by
user_options.response: In our culture, we don't just pass by elders without proper greeting
user_options.cultural_note: Should show proper respect and purpose

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your uncle told me about you. I hear you are doing well in school

user_options.text: Yes ma, by God's grace. I just finished my exams
user_options.response: Well done, my child. Education is very important

user_options.text: Yeah, I'm smart
user_options.response: Don't be proud, my child. Always be humble

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: May God continue to bless you and your studies. Your uncle is waiting for you inside
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You showed perfect respect and cultural understanding when greeting elders.

scenarios.title: Business Introduction
scenarios.description: Practice introducing yourself in business settings

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good afternoon. I don't believe we've met. I'm Chika Okoro from GTBank

user_options.text: Good afternoon, Ms. Okoro. I'm Femi Balogun from Flutterwave. Pleasure to meet you
user_options.response: Likewise, Mr. Balogun. I've heard great things about Flutterwave

user_options.text: Hi, I'm Femi
user_options.response: Nice to meet you, Femi. What company are you with?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Here's my business card. What department do you work in at Flutterwave?

user_options.text: Thank you. Here's mine. I'm a Product Manager in the payments division
user_options.response: Interesting! We're actually looking at payment integrations
user_options.cultural_note: Proper business card exchange with role details

user_options.text: I don't have cards with me
user_options.response: No problem. So what exactly do you do at Flutterwave?
user_options.cultural_note: Should be prepared with business cards

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We should connect about potential collaboration. Are you available for coffee next week?

user_options.text: That would be great. I'm available Tuesday or Wednesday morning
user_options.response: Perfect. Let's do Tuesday at 10 AM at the cafe downstairs

user_options.text: I'm busy
user_options.response: Perhaps we can connect another time then
user_options.cultural_note: Too abrupt, should be more diplomatic

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Looking forward to our meeting. It was great connecting with you
conversation_flow.completion_message: Outstanding! You handled the business introduction and networking perfectly.

scenarios.title: Family Gathering Greetings
scenarios.description: Practice greetings at family events and gatherings

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome, welcome! My brother's child! Come inside, the family is here

user_options.text: Good afternoon, Uncle Tunde. Thank you for having me. How is the family?
user_options.response: We are all fine, my child. Your aunty and cousins are inside

user_options.text: Hey, what's going on?
user_options.response: Is that how you greet your uncle? Where are your manners?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your cousin Ngozi just arrived from America. Do you remember her?

user_options.text: Yes Uncle, we grew up together. I look forward to seeing her again
user_options.response: She's in the living room with the others. Go and greet everyone

user_options.text: I don't remember her
user_options.response: She's your family! You should make effort to remember your relatives

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Ngozi, look who's here! Your cousin from Lagos

user_options.text: Ngozi! Long time! You look wonderful. How was your flight?
user_options.response: Thank you! The flight was long but I'm happy to be home

user_options.text: Hi
user_options.response: Is that all you have to say to your cousin after years?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The family is complete now! Let's take pictures before dinner
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You showed excellent family values and cultural respect at the gathering.

modules.title: Shopping & Markets
modules.description: Master shopping conversations and bargaining techniques

scenarios.title: Bargaining for Fabric
scenarios.description: Practice price negotiation at fabric market

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome! These are beautiful Ankara fabrics from Ghana. 8,000 Naira per piece

user_options.text: They are beautiful, but 8,000 is quite high. Can you do 5,000?
user_options.response: 5,000 is too low! This is quality fabric. I can do 7,000 for you

user_options.text: That's too expensive, I'm leaving
user_options.response: Wait, wait! Let's talk about the price. What can you afford?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: 7,000 is my best price. Look at the quality!

user_options.text: If I buy two pieces, can you give me both for 12,000?
user_options.response: You drive hard bargain! Okay, for two pieces, 12,000 Naira

user_options.text: Okay, I'll take it for 7,000
user_options.response: Good decision! This fabric will make beautiful clothes
user_options.cultural_note: Accepting fair price is also good

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Do you need matching thread or any other accessories?

user_options.text: Yes, please add matching thread and 2 meters of lining
user_options.response: Perfect! Your total is 14,500 Naira for everything

user_options.text: No, that's all
user_options.response: Okay, 12,000 Naira for two fabrics. Thank you!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for your business! Come back for more beautiful fabrics!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent bargaining! You got a great deal on quality fabrics.

scenarios.title: Buying Electronics
scenarios.description: Practice asking about features and warranties

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good afternoon! Interested in smartphones? We have latest Samsung and iPhone

user_options.text: Yes, I'm looking for a phone with good camera and long battery life
user_options.response: Perfect! This Samsung A54 has 128GB storage and excellent camera

user_options.text: I want a phone
user_options.response: What type of phone? What features are important to you?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: This model is 150,000 Naira. It comes with 1-year warranty

user_options.text: Does the warranty cover screen damage? And can I pay in installments?
user_options.response: Warranty covers manufacturing defects only. We have 3-month installment plan

user_options.text: I'll take it
user_options.response: Don't you want to know about warranty and payment options?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Would you like screen protector and case? It's 5,000 Naira extra

user_options.text: Yes, please include screen protector and a good quality case
user_options.response: Excellent! Your total is 155,000 Naira. Let me package everything

user_options.text: No, I don't need protection
user_options.response: I strongly recommend protection for your new phone

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Here's your phone with all accessories and warranty card. Enjoy!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Well done! You made a smart electronics purchase with all the right questions.

scenarios.title: Weekly Grocery Shopping
scenarios.description: Practice comprehensive grocery shopping

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome to our store! Do you need help finding anything?

user_options.text: Yes, I'm looking for rice, beans, vegetable oil, and tomatoes
user_options.response: Grains are in aisle 3, cooking oil in aisle 2, fresh produce at the back

user_options.text: I need food
user_options.response: What specific food items are you looking for?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We have different rice varieties. Local ofada rice is 2,500 per kg, imported is 1,800

user_options.text: I'll take 5kg of local ofada rice and 2kg of brown beans
user_options.response: Good choice! Local rice has better flavor. Anything else?

user_options.text: Just give me any rice
user_options.response: We have different types and prices. Which do you prefer?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your total so far is 18,500 Naira. Will you need spices and seasonings?

user_options.text: Yes, add curry, thyme, and 2 cubes of Maggi
user_options.response: Perfect! Your final total is 20,000 Naira. Proceed to checkout

user_options.text: No, that's too much
user_options.response: These are essential cooking ingredients. Would you like to adjust your quantities?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for shopping with us! Have a wonderful day!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You completed your weekly grocery shopping efficiently.

scenarios.title: Returning Faulty Item
scenarios.description: Practice returning defective products to store

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning. How can I help you?

user_options.text: Good morning. I'd like to return this blender I bought last week. It's not working
user_options.response: I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have your receipt?

user_options.text: This thing you sold me is rubbish!
user_options.response: Sir, please calm down. Can you explain the problem?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Let me check the receipt. What exactly is wrong with the blender?

user_options.text: The motor makes loud noise and doesn't blend properly. I've only used it twice
user_options.response: I see. Let me test it. Yes, there's definitely a problem

user_options.text: It just doesn't work
user_options.response: Can you be more specific about what's not working?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: You're within our 14-day return period. Would you like refund or exchange?

user_options.text: I'd prefer an exchange for the same model, please
user_options.response: Certainly! Let me get you a new one from stock

user_options.text: I want my money back and compensation!
user_options.response: We can offer refund or exchange, but compensation is not our policy

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Here's your new blender with updated warranty. We apologize for the inconvenience
conversation_flow.completion_message: Well handled! You successfully returned the faulty item while maintaining good relations.

scenarios.title: Buying Fresh Fish
scenarios.description: Practice selecting and buying fresh fish

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome! Fresh fish from Port Harcourt! Titus, croaker, and barracuda available!

user_options.text: The Titus fish looks fresh. How much per kg?
user_options.response: Titus is 1,800 Naira per kg. Very fresh, came this morning!

user_options.text: I want fish
user_options.response: What type of fish? We have different types and prices

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: How many kg do you want? I can clean and scale it for you

user_options.text: I'll take 2 kg of Titus. Please clean and remove the scales
user_options.response: Good choice! That will be 3,600 Naira. Want pepper and onions too?

user_options.text: Just give me one fish
user_options.response: Fish is sold by weight, not by piece. How many kg?
user_options.cultural_note: Should understand fish selling by weight

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your fish is cleaned and ready! Need ingredients for pepper soup?

user_options.text: Yes, add utazi leaves, uziza, and small peppers for pepper soup
user_options.response: Perfect! Total is 4,200 Naira for everything

user_options.text: No, that's all
user_options.response: Okay, 3,600 Naira for the fish. Enjoy your meal!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you! Come back for fresh fish every Tuesday and Friday!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You successfully bought fresh fish and ingredients for a perfect Nigerian meal.

modules.title: Transportation
modules.description: Navigate various transportation situations in Nigeria

scenarios.title: Bus Commute to Work
scenarios.description: Practice taking bus for daily commute

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Oshodi! Oshodi! Enter quick! We dey go Oshodi!

user_options.text: Does this bus go through Yaba? I'm going to UNILAG
user_options.response: Yes, we pass Yaba. Enter quick! Fare na 300 Naira

user_options.text: I'm going far
user_options.response: Where exactly? We need to know your stop

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Fare na 300 Naira to Yaba. You get change?

user_options.text: Yes, here's 500 Naira
user_options.response: Thank you. Here's your 200 Naira change. Find seat

user_options.text: I only have 1,000 Naira note
user_options.response: Oga, no change for 1,000. You get smaller money?
user_options.cultural_note: Large notes problematic for bus fare

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Traffic don hold for Third Mainland Bridge. We go reach Yaba for about 30 minutes

user_options.text: No problem. Please let me know when we reach UNILAG junction
user_options.response: I go call you. No worry!

user_options.text: That's too long!
user_options.response: Na Lagos traffic, my brother. Nothing we fit do

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: UNILAG junction don reach! Safe journey to your destination!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You successfully navigated the bus commute like a true Lagosian.

scenarios.title: Taxi Fare Negotiation
scenarios.description: Practice negotiating taxi fares

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Taxi! Where you dey go?

user_options.text: Good afternoon. I'm going to Victoria Island, from here to Ajose Adeogun
user_options.response: VI? That one na 5,000 Naira

user_options.text: I'm going far
user_options.response: Oga, where exactly? I need to know the place

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: 5,000 Naira to VI. Traffic heavy for Lekki road

user_options.text: 5,000 is too much. I can pay 3,500
user_options.response: 3,500 no reach at all! Make we do 4,200

user_options.text: That's robbery! I'll find another taxi
user_options.response: No problem. Check other taxis, you go see say my price fair
user_options.cultural_note: Too aggressive, might not get better deal

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: 4,200 na last price. You want enter or you go find another taxi?

user_options.text: Okay, 4,200 is fair. Please use the meter
user_options.response: Meter dey work. Enter make we dey go!
user_options.cultural_note: Agreeing on price with meter request

user_options.text: I'll pay 4,000, final offer
user_options.response: Okay, since you talk am like that. Enter!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We don reach your destination! Thank you for your patronage!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent negotiation! You got a fair taxi fare for your journey.

scenarios.title: Airport Check-in
scenarios.description: Practice airport procedures and check-in

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning. Passport and ticket please. How many bags are you checking in?

user_options.text: Good morning. Here's my passport and e-ticket. I have one suitcase to check in
user_options.response: Thank you. Please place your bag on the scale

user_options.text: I'm traveling
user_options.response: I need to see your passport and ticket please

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your bag is 22kg. The limit is 23kg, so you're good. Window or aisle seat?

user_options.text: I'd prefer a window seat, please. Towards the front if possible
user_options.response: I have 14A available. Is that okay?

user_options.text: Any seat is fine
user_options.response: I need you to choose between window or aisle seat

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: 14A it is. Any dangerous items in your luggage? Batteries, lighters, sharp objects?

user_options.text: No dangerous items. Just clothes and personal toiletries
user_options.response: Perfect. Here's your boarding pass. Gate 15, boarding at 2:30 PM

user_options.text: I have my kitchen knife for protection
user_options.response: Knives are not allowed in checked luggage. You'll need to remove it

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Have a pleasant flight! Proceed through security to your gate
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You handled the airport check-in process smoothly and professionally.

scenarios.title: Asking for City Directions
scenarios.description: Practice getting directions within the city

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: You look lost. Can I help you find something?

user_options.text: Yes please, I'm trying to find the National Theatre. Am I going the right way?
user_options.response: National Theatre? You're actually going opposite direction. Turn back

user_options.text: Where is that big building?
user_options.response: Which big building? There are many big buildings in Lagos

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Go straight down this road until you see Eko Hotel on your left

user_options.text: Straight until Eko Hotel on left. Then where?
user_options.response: Then turn right at the junction. National Theatre will be on your right

user_options.text: Okay, thanks
user_options.response: Do you understand the directions? Should I repeat?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: It's about 15 minutes walk from here. You can't miss it - big white building

user_options.text: Thank you so much for your help! Straight to Eko Hotel, then right. Got it!
user_options.response: Exactly! Safe journey!

user_options.text: Is it far?
user_options.response: I already told you it's 15 minutes. Do you need a taxi?
user_options.cultural_note: Should listen carefully to information given

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: You're welcome! Enjoy your visit to National Theatre!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You successfully asked for and understood directions in the city.

scenarios.title: Taking Okada Ride
scenarios.description: Practice using motorcycle taxi service

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Okada! Where you dey go?

user_options.text: I'm going to Allen Junction. How much?
user_options.response: Allen? 500 Naira. Traffic don hold for road

user_options.text: Take me somewhere
user_options.response: Oga, I need to know where you dey go before I talk price

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: 500 Naira to Allen. You get helmet?

user_options.text: 500 is okay. Do you have an extra helmet for me?
user_options.response: Yes, I get extra helmet. Enter make we dey go!

user_options.text: I don't need helmet
user_options.response: Oga, safety first. You must wear helmet

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Hold the back well well. I go avoid potholes for road

user_options.text: Okay, please drive safely. There are many potholes on this road
user_options.response: No worry! I know this road like my hand. We go reach soon

user_options.text: Drive fast, I'm in a hurry
user_options.response: No, I no go rush. Safety first, my brother

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Allen don reach! Safe landing!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Well done! You took an okada ride safely and negotiated properly.

modules.title: Health & Emergencies
modules.description: Handle medical situations and emergency conversations

scenarios.title: Doctor's Appointment
scenarios.description: Practice describing symptoms to doctor

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning. I'm Dr. Adebayo. What seems to be the problem?

user_options.text: Good morning doctor. I've had fever and body pains since yesterday
user_options.response: I see. What's your temperature? Any cough or cold?

user_options.text: I'm not feeling well
user_options.response: Can you be more specific about your symptoms?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Any other symptoms besides fever and body pains?

user_options.text: Yes, I also have headache and I've been feeling very weak
user_options.response: Have you taken any medication for these symptoms?

user_options.text: Just give me injection
user_options.response: I need to understand your condition before prescribing treatment

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Let me check your temperature and blood pressure. Any allergies to medications?

user_options.text: No known allergies. I've taken paracetamol before without issues
user_options.response: Good to know. Your temperature is 38.5°C. I'll prescribe antibiotics

user_options.text: I don't know about allergies
user_options.response: It's important to know your medication allergies for safe treatment

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Take this prescription to the pharmacy. Rest well and drink plenty of water
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You effectively communicated your health issues to the doctor.

scenarios.title: Pharmacy Medicine Purchase
scenarios.description: Practice buying medicine at pharmacy

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good afternoon. How can I help you?

user_options.text: Good afternoon. I have a prescription from my doctor for antibiotics
user_options.response: Let me see the prescription. Ah, amoxicillin for 5 days

user_options.text: I need medicine for fever
user_options.response: Do you have a prescription? What did the doctor recommend?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: This medication should be taken twice daily after meals. Any allergies?

user_options.text: No allergies. Should I avoid any foods or other medications?
user_options.response: Avoid alcohol and take with plenty of water. That will be 3,500 Naira

user_options.text: Just give me the medicine
user_options.response: I need to explain the dosage and precautions first

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Do you need pain relievers or vitamin C supplements with this?

user_options.text: Yes, please add vitamin C and paracetamol for the fever
user_options.response: Good choice. Your total is 5,200 Naira. Get well soon!

user_options.text: No, that's too expensive
user_options.response: These are recommended to help your recovery. Would you like just the antibiotics?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Remember to complete the full course of antibiotics. Feel better!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Well done! You handled the pharmacy purchase professionally and asked important questions.

scenarios.title: Emergency Room Visit
scenarios.description: Practice emergency medical situations

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Emergency! What happened?

user_options.text: My friend collapsed and can't breathe properly! He has asthma history!
user_options.response: Asthma attack! Bring him quickly! Does he have an inhaler?

user_options.text: He's sick
user_options.response: What exactly happened? I need specific symptoms!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We need his medical history quickly! Any known allergies? Current medications?

user_options.text: He's allergic to penicillin! Takes ventolin inhaler daily! No other medications!
user_options.response: Penicillin allergy noted! Doctor is coming! Oxygen administered!

user_options.text: I don't know about allergies
user_options.response: This is important! Try to remember any medical information!
user_options.cultural_note: Should know friend's critical medical info

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We're stabilizing him. Are you family? We need contact information

user_options.text: I'm his colleague. Here's his wife's number and his ID card
user_options.response: Thank you! We'll contact his family. Please wait in the waiting area

user_options.text: I don't know his family
user_options.response: Check his phone for emergency contacts. We need to notify family

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Patient is stable now. You acted quickly and saved his life. Thank you!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Outstanding emergency response! Your quick thinking and clear communication saved a life.

scenarios.title: Dental Check-up
scenarios.description: Practice dental appointment conversation

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Good morning. I'm Dr. Bello. What brings you to the dental clinic today?

user_options.text: Good morning doctor. I have tooth pain on my lower left side when eating
user_options.response: I see. How long have you had this pain? Is it sensitive to hot or cold?

user_options.text: My mouth hurts
user_options.response: Can you be more specific? Which tooth? When does it hurt?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Open wide please. I see some cavities. When was your last dental checkup?

user_options.text: It's been about two years. I've been brushing twice daily but still get cavities
user_options.response: Regular checkups are important. I recommend cleaning and fillings

user_options.text: I never go to dentist
user_options.response: Dental health is important. You should have regular checkups

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: We'll do cleaning today and schedule fillings for next week. Any questions?

user_options.text: How can I prevent more cavities? Should I change my toothpaste?
user_options.response: Use fluoride toothpaste, floss daily, and reduce sugary drinks. Your toothpaste is fine

user_options.text: Just fix the pain
user_options.response: Treatment is important, but prevention is better. Let's discuss dental care

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Your cleaning is done. Schedule your filling appointment on the way out
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You handled the dental appointment professionally and asked important health questions.

scenarios.title: First Aid Assistance
scenarios.description: Practice helping someone with minor injury

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Help! I cut my hand with a kitchen knife! It's bleeding!

user_options.text: Stay calm! Let me see the cut. Do you have a first aid kit?
user_options.response: Yes, in the kitchen cabinet! It's bleeding a lot!

user_options.text: Oh no! You're going to die!
user_options.response: Please don't panic! I need help, not drama!

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Here's the first aid kit! What should we do?

user_options.text: Apply pressure with this clean cloth to stop bleeding. Keep the hand elevated
user_options.response: Okay, applying pressure. The bleeding is slowing down

user_options.text: Put some pepper on it
user_options.response: No! That's not proper first aid! We need to clean it properly

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The bleeding has stopped. Should we go to hospital?

user_options.text: Yes, for deep cuts you need tetanus shot and proper cleaning. I'll drive you
user_options.response: Thank you! You saved me from serious infection

user_options.text: No, it's fine now
user_options.response: Knife cuts can cause serious infections. We should see a doctor

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for your quick thinking and help! You're a lifesaver!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent first aid response! You remained calm and provided proper emergency assistance.

modules.title: Social Events
modules.description: Navigate conversations at various social gatherings

scenarios.title: Wedding Reception
scenarios.description: Practice conversations at wedding celebration

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Congratulations! Beautiful wedding, isn't it? Are you friend of the bride or groom?

user_options.text: Thank you! I'm friend of the bride from university. The ceremony was wonderful
user_options.response: Ah, university friends! I'm the groom's cousin from Abuja

user_options.text: I'm just here for food
user_options.response: Oh... well, the food looks good indeed
user_options.cultural_note: Should show genuine interest in wedding

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The couple looks so happy! How do you know the bride?

user_options.text: We were roommates in UNILAG. I'm so happy she found such a wonderful partner
user_options.response: That's beautiful! The groom is my favorite cousin. Such a good match!

user_options.text: We used to date
user_options.response: Oh... that's... interesting. Let's talk about something else

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The food is being served! Have you tried the jollof rice? It's delicious!

user_options.text: Not yet! The small chops were amazing. Let's get some jollof rice together
user_options.response: Great idea! Let's join the food line. This is such a joyful celebration!

user_options.text: I don't like wedding food
user_options.response: Oh... well, the cake looks nice at least

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: What a beautiful celebration! May their marriage be blessed!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You engaged in lovely wedding conversations and showed genuine happiness for the couple.

scenarios.title: Birthday Party
scenarios.description: Practice socializing at birthday celebration

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Happy birthday! Welcome to my party! So glad you could make it!

user_options.text: Happy birthday! Thank you for inviting me. Here's a small gift for you
user_options.response: Thank you so much! You shouldn't have! Please enjoy the party!

user_options.text: Hey, where's the cake?
user_options.response: Cake will be served later. Nice to see you too...
user_options.cultural_note: Should greet properly before asking about food

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The music is great! Are you enjoying the party?

user_options.text: Yes, the atmosphere is wonderful! The decorations are beautiful too
user_options.response: Thank you! My sisters helped with decorations. Let me introduce you to friends

user_options.text: It's okay
user_options.response: Oh... well, I hope it gets better. Let me check on other guests

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: This is my friend Tunde from work. Tunde, this is my friend from childhood

user_options.text: Nice to meet you, Tunde! What department do you work in?
user_options.response: I'm in IT support. Nice to meet you too! How do you know the birthday girl?

user_options.text: Hi
user_options.response: Hello... so, how's the party going?

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Time for cake cutting! Everyone gather around!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Wonderful! You were the perfect birthday guest - engaging, positive, and socially appropriate.

scenarios.title: Funeral Condolences
scenarios.description: Practice offering condolences at funeral

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for coming. This is a difficult time for our family

user_options.text: I'm so sorry for your loss. Mama was a wonderful woman. May her soul rest in peace
user_options.response: Thank you. She spoke highly of you. Please sign the condolence register

user_options.text: What happened? How did she die?
user_options.response: This is not the time for such questions. Please be respectful

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: She fought bravely. We take comfort that she's no longer suffering

user_options.text: She was so strong. I'll always remember her kindness and wisdom
user_options.response: Thank you for those kind words. They mean a lot to us

user_options.text: At least she lived long
user_options.response: Length of life doesn't make the loss easier to bear

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The service will start soon. Please take a program and find a seat

user_options.text: Of course. Please let me know if there's anything I can do to help the family
user_options.response: Thank you for your support. It means everything during this time

user_options.text: Okay, see you later
user_options.response: Yes... thank you for coming
user_options.cultural_note: Should show more empathy and support

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for your support and kind words. They comfort us greatly
conversation_flow.completion_message: Compassionate and respectful. You offered perfect condolences during a difficult time.

scenarios.title: Naming Ceremony
scenarios.description: Practice conversations at baby naming ceremony

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Welcome to our baby's naming ceremony! So glad you could join us!

user_options.text: Congratulations! What a beautiful baby! What name have you chosen?
user_options.response: Thank you! We named her Ifeoluwa - God's love. The ceremony starts soon

user_options.text: Another baby? Population is increasing o!
user_options.response: This is a blessed occasion. Please be respectful

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The grandmother will perform the naming rites. Do you understand Yoruba traditions?

user_options.text: I'm familiar with some traditions. Will there be symbolic items like honey and salt?
user_options.response: Yes! Honey for sweetness, salt for flavor of life. You know our culture well!

user_options.text: I don't care about traditions
user_options.response: These traditions are important to our family. Please respect them

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The baby is receiving blessings from elders. Would you like to give a blessing?

user_options.text: I would be honored. May Ifeoluwa grow in wisdom, health, and God's favor
user_options.response: Beautiful blessing! Thank you! Now time for food and celebration!

user_options.text: I don't know what to say
user_options.response: A simple good wish for the baby's future would be fine

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Thank you for celebrating with us! Ifeoluwa is blessed to have you in her life!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Perfect! You respected the cultural traditions and celebrated the new baby appropriately.

scenarios.title: Office End of Year Party
scenarios.description: Practice socializing at work party

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: Great party! The HR team really outdid themselves this year!

user_options.text: They did! The food is amazing and it's nice to see everyone relaxing
user_options.response: Yes! No spreadsheets tonight! How was your year in accounting?

user_options.text: I hate office parties
user_options.response: Oh... well, try to enjoy yourself. It's a team building event

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: I heard your team exceeded their targets this quarter! Congratulations!

user_options.text: Thank you! It was a team effort. Your marketing campaigns really helped drive sales
user_options.response: That's great to hear! Collaboration between departments really works!

user_options.text: Yeah, I'm the best
user_options.response: Well... it's usually a team effort in our company

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: The MD is giving a speech. Should we move closer to hear?

user_options.text: Good idea. It's always inspiring to hear the year-end review and plans for next year
user_options.response: Absolutely! Let's grab our drinks and find good spots

user_options.text: I don't care about speeches
user_options.response: It's important to show respect for leadership, especially at company events

conversation_flow.character_dialogue: What a wonderful way to end the year! Looking forward to working with you next year!
conversation_flow.completion_message: Excellent! You maintained perfect professional-social balance at the office party.
